name: fossick
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to search for something amongst other things: fossick around We then had to spend about half an hour fossicking around for our bags.
to look for gold or valuable stones, especially in places where these things were once dug from the ground: fossick for They travelled to Glenalva to try fossicking for sapphires.
